html:
5.10.17  8:36 pm   Uh hi you forgot brexit in that video on the history of the world but other than that you did well kthxbye

     i did not forget brexit, i decided it would be irresponsible to mention brexit because what if the entire EU collapses next year. then it will look pretty silly to only mention brexit, when brexit is really a small piece of a larger story
5.10.17  8:20 pm   favorite song?

5.10.17  8:04 pm   What is the meaning of your existence?

      try to express infinite ideas, in a finite amount of time and space

5.10.17  7:53 pm   do you believe in enlightenment?

     oh hell yeah
5.10.17  7:38 pm   What's your musical education background?

5.10.17  7:15 pm   are you obama

     no

5.10.17  6:56 pm   Should cats have ears?

     yes!

5.10.17  6:55 pm   What is there?

     stuff, things, etc

5.10.17  6:55 pm   Are you burned out on making history of videos?

     hahahahahahahaha i'm not sure

5.10.17  6:53 pm   Are you a mouse or a Llama?

     not really

5.10.17  6:50 pm   Why did you make this

     so i can answer peoples' questions

5.10.17  6:50 pm   1. What was the hardest part about making the history of ___ videos?

     figuring out which millions of things to leave out

      2. If you were to make another video like that, any idea what it would be about?

     something completely different

5.10.17  6:46 pm   Why do you not want to make money from your videos?

     i don't not

     Do you have a separate career?

     yes

5.10.17  6:45 pm   Bill! I was ecstatic when I saw your vid released, and just finished watching it for the first time. Now that it's done, do you feel any stress being lifted from your shoulders?

     yes

5.10.17  6:45 pm   I supported you on patreon with $2.00 do you think that is enough?

     oh hell yeah!

5.10.17  6:44 pm   Bill! Congratulations on releasing your new video! Its a good one. My question is, where will you go from here? I mean, the history of the world is an ambitious topic, and you pretty much nailed it. So how can you one-up that? *<*

     i can't tell you
5.10.17  6:43 pm   Do you play any video games or games in general? And would it be possible for you to list a few?

5.10.17  6:42 pm   Did you make history of the world so no one will ever ask you to make another history video because you can say you covered everything?

     no, that video absolutely did not cover everything. but i thought it would be a thrill to try

5.10.17  6:41 pm   Are you going to go back to short videos or another long in or music or undecided?

     i would like to focus on things of a medium size

5.10.17  6:41 pm   i love your short videos, will you make more of them?

     i would like to catch up on medium videos

5.10.17  6:39 pm   Are there going to be more videos like "history of the entire world, i guess"? It was pure gold!

     maybe
5.10.17  6:35 pm   what's your myers-briggs type?

5.10.17  6:33 pm   how are there 3 americas but only one part of one america is the real america

     united states has aquired the nickname "america" which i think is unfair, because america actually means that huge entire continent in the western hemisphere, actually it's 2 continents

5.10.17  6:28 pm   What is your favorite word processer

     that simple one that probably comes with your computer. not the weird one, the simple one

5.10.17  6:26 pm   Oh shit, do we get more songs i like songs songs are good yes please

     oh hell yeah
5.10.17  6:25 pm   what was your favorite class in school?

5.10.17  6:25 pm   Are you gonna keep answering questions on here?

     yes

5.10.17  6:22 pm   This is a question

     are you sure
5.10.17  6:17 pm   What made you want to make the history of Japan video?
5.10.17  6:14 pm   Why do some times my questions (maybe this one) will never appear?

5.10.17  6:14 pm   Any plans for a follow up to history of the entire world, i guess?

     not right now

5.10.17  6:13 pm   will you make other long videos like history of japan and history of the world?

     i would like to catch up on medium videos

5.10.17  6:10 pm   you are very laconic. Why?

     i just looked up that word, and it means 'using few words.' i'm wondering if you realize how many thousands of questions i've answered on here

5.10.17  6:07 pm   You exist? How's that going?

     good. how's it going for you

5.10.17  6:06 pm   So, how was your break?

     what break

5.10.17  6:04 pm   So now that it's done, what's next?

     i can't tell you

5.10.17  6:02 pm   you forgot about the troubles in ireland

     no i didn't. but it is not in the video i just made, unfortnuately. not everything in the universe fits into 20 minutes. i'm so sorry

5.10.17  6:02 pm   How are you so awesome that you summarized the entire universe in just under 20 minutes?

     i dunno but i actually had to leave a lot of it out

5.10.17  6:00 pm   will you do an ama on /r/videos please we love you

     i have answered over 15,000 questions on this site, and will answer many more, in the future. that will have to be good enough

5.10.17  5:59 pm   Congrats on birthing this fully grown 20 minute long child! It's beautiful! Was it painful?

     yes

5.10.17  5:58 pm   Are you aware that HoTEWIG is amazing?

     i tried my best

5.10.17  5:58 pm   do you feel relived finishing history of the entire world

     oh hell yeah

5.10.17  5:57 pm   Your history videos are so good have you thought about becoming a history teacher/professor?

     no

5.10.17  5:56 pm   great video, I think you went a bit overboard with the detail though

     some people think i didn't include enough

5.10.17  5:54 pm   why do people ask you to put ads on your video? do people exist that want to see advertisements?

     i think some people like them

5.10.17  5:54 pm   What? Poland saved the Europe 2 times? Never heard about that.(Great video anyway) Why Poland not mentioned?

     i tried my best

5.10.17  5:53 pm   You made HOTEWIG. What's next?

     i can't tell you

5.10.17  5:52 pm   How much time did you spend working on HOTEWIG at one time? As in did you sit down and work on it for hours and hours at intervals, hour of so of work irregularly, etc.

     i tried to finish it as quickly as humanly possible

5.10.17  5:48 pm   do you feel relieved after finishing with that history of the world video?

     oh hell yeah

5.10.17  5:44 pm   Do you feel great that history of the entire world is finally done and dusted?

     oh hell yeah
